mapper.sql: id, unit_code, unit_name, enroll_count, enroll_total_count, apply_time, apply_time_day, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.insert:
insert into report_unit_enroll
id,
unit_code,
unit_name,
enroll_count,
enroll_total_count,
apply_time,
apply_time_day,
gmt_create,
gmt_modified,

mapper.update:
update report_unit_enroll
unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enroll_count = #{enrollCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enroll_total_count = #{enrollTotalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_time_day = #{applyTimeDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update report_unit_enroll set unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_name = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enroll_count = #{enrollCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, enroll_total_count = #{enrollTotalCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_time_day = #{applyTimeDay,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sum(enroll_count) as enrollCount from report_unit_enroll where unit_code = #{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and apply_time_day < #{applyTimeDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM open_player GROUP BY player_name,player_phone,open_plat_type ) AS a1
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1) AS total FROM open_score GROUP BY player_name,player_phone,open_plat_type ) AS a1
SELECT apply_time as applyTime,unit_code as unitCode ,unit_name as name,SUM(enroll_count) as value from report_unit_enroll group by unit_code

select apply_time as applyTime,unit_code as unitCode,unit_name as unitName,enroll_count as enrollCount,enroll_total_count as enrollTotalCount from report_unit_enroll where 1=1 GROUP BY unit_code order by apply_time desc LIMIT 0,5
select DISTINCT(apply_time_day) as apply_time_day from report_unit_enroll order by apply_time_day asc LIMIT 0,1
